nodes.text: The Automated Checkpoint was a security checkpoint in the abandoned Rakata machine chamber in the Tomb, an ancient Rakata prison on the planet Belsavis. The checkpoint remained active and manned by Rakata warden droids thousands of years after the collapse of the Infinite Empire, and the droids allowed Republic forces to visit the outpost without attacking.
The Automated Checkpoint is the primary Republic outpost in the Tomb on the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
